name: The Juno Incident
description:
Official 7DFPS Game Jam entry page

Controls

  • WSAD or arrow keys to move, Space to jump.
  • Aim with mouse (click once in web viewer to capture the mouse).
  • LMB to fire laser pistol (semi-auto). - RMB to lob a grenade.

Overview

As a maintenance officer for the JMC (Juno Mining Corporation), you're responsible for the upkeep of all operations in quadrant 100.13.40. Touching down on JMC-305011 to fix a busted power exchange coupling, you soon realize something is terribly wrong!

This game was created for the 2013 7DFPS game jam, where the goal is to create a First Person Shooter in one week.

Credits

  • Built in Unity3d by @stevesalmond
  • Models created with Blender
  • Leaderboard courtesy of dreamlo
  • Some sounds sourced from freesound.org (CC0 licensed)
  • Font is Echo by Tracer Tong
  • Explosion effects made with Ben Throop's awesome Detonator framework.
